feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.115.0
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.114.1...v5.115.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.115.1
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed newsletter preferences for paid signups (#22664) - Fabien O'Carroll
  • 🐛 Fixed incorrect slug increments for post title changes - Fabien O'Carroll
  • 🌐 Added French strings for newsletter copy (#22596) - gengelberts
  • 🌐 Updated Brazilian Portuguese translations for Newsletter (#22593) - Alexandre "Lekler" Rodrigues
  • 🌐 Updated Turkish translations for Newsletter (#22595) - echobilisim3421

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.115.0...v5.115.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.116.0
entry.content:
• ✨ Added new CTA card with web and email visibility controls - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed links showing incorrect counts after refresh - Fabien O'Carroll
  • 🐛 Fixed links being shown in incorrect order - Fabien O'Carroll

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.115.1...v5.116.0
